attributes.additional_details: I think that postponing exams is not as helpful since we’ve missed a lot more than 3 weeks - many students have not been contacted by the teachers throughout lockdown. Cancelling them completely could lead to similar complications as last year, whereas reducing the content seems like a fair way to do it.
attributes.background: Reduce the curriculum and announce what could be taken out of the courses - it’s unfair how much we’ve missed, often with no contact from schools, but having to do the whole course in reduced time.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/320772
